name: Simple RARBG
description: Cleans up and simplifies RARBG's very limited interface by removing columns, setting a custom font and setting a custom colour for visited links.
additional_info:
Note only applies to Torrents page (e.g. https://rarbg.to/torrents.php).

Nice, practical and to the point it was tested on 1920x1080p screen docked at 50% width.

Version: 1.0A
- Set "Iosevka Light" for default font
- Changed some bolded text to normal
